text: The Moonshiner is a 1904 American short silent action movie directed by Wallace McCutcheon, Sr.. It was produced by American Mutoscope & Biograph Company. ==Other websites== *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZyttk48N2I *https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0283495/ Category:1904 movies Category:1900s action movies Category:American silent movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies about alcohol Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: The Moonshiner (movie)
